name: device_decrease
description: This function is used to decrease a setting on a specified SmartThings device without turning it off.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to decrease.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to perform on the device.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The level delta to decrease the device setting.

parameters.name: predefinedUnit
parameters.description: The predefined unit related to the device setting.
